item.title: Trump, Mamdani to meet in Oval Office as mayor-elect pushes affordability agenda
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is scheduled to meet President Donald Trump for the first time Friday.

item.title: WATCH: Fire breaks out at U.N. climate event in Brazil
item.description: A fire broke out at the venue hosting U.N. climate talks in Brazil, prompting evacuations as firefighters rushed to control the flames.

item.title: Indian fighter jet crashes during a demo flight at Dubai Air Show, killing the pilot
item.description: The pilot of an Indian combat plane has died after a crash during a demonstration flight at the Dubai Air Show

item.title: US revives Ukraine-Russia peace push with Zelenskyy on the defensive
item.description: A high-level U.S. military delegation arrived in Kyiv on Wednesday in a bid to revive the White Houseâ€™s stalled push for an end to Russia's invasion.

item.title: WATCH: Former President Bush delivers eulogy for former Vice President Cheney
item.description: Former President George W. Bush reflects on choosing Dick Cheney as his vice president during remarks at Cheney's funeral.
